title: THE BROKEN CONSTITUTION With Noah Feldman
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: I'm joined by Noah Feldman to discuss his latest book The Broken Constitution. We discuss how the American constitution was made in debates and compromises over slavery and remade by Lincoln.
